item.title: Sacred Geometry with Donald Duck
item.description: Walt Disney was a master of visualization, and manifestation. His studies of the mathematical principles found in nature, and the potential of mental visualization are evident in this piece from the 1950s.

item.title: Peterf Full Bio
item.description: Teacher of Emptiness Design, "Make a Mindful Mark", non-linear non-verbal exercises to open space for creative innovation. Calligrapher, type designer, Irish musician, chef, photographer, humanistic optimist, nature lover. eternal student of whole systems and the nature of consciousness.
